content: Sporting event delegation **[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)** participated in the **[1998 Asian Games](/wiki/1998_Asian_Games)** held in [Bangkok](/wiki/Bangkok), [Thailand](/wiki/Thailand) from December 6, 1998 to December 20, 1998. Athletes from Singapore succeeded in winning two golds, three silvers and nine bronzes, making total fourteen medals. Singapore finished seventeenth in a medal table. ## Medalists MedalNameSportEvent Gold[Siew Shaw Her](/wiki/Siew_Shaw_Her) [Colin Ng](/wiki/Colin_Ng)[Sailing](/wiki/Sailing_at_the_1998_Asian_Games)[Men's 420](/wiki/Sailing_at_the_1998_Asian_Games_%E2%80%93_Men%27s_420) GoldJoan Huang Naomi
